cu.explanation_en: Setting the local S interface name to an empty string will cause interface binding failures and prevent SCTP connections.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RU thread core to 100, which exceeds the available CPU cores, will cause thread allocation failures.
du.explanation_zh: 將 RU 線程核心設定為 100，超過可用 CPU 核心數量，將導致線程分配失敗。
